subject: baseplate.
description_text:
Hi, I recently bought a pro x ultra and  didn’t notice I buy without the base plate.
Can I re purchase the ultra base plate?

Also the carbon fiber heel plate it’s come with rise up tube and screws?
Thanks.

conversations.body_text: Hi Mklee,  Here is the purchase link for the ProX Ultra base plate separately.        https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-pedal-pro-x-with-heel-plate?variant=50475339645242 ​
is the carbon fiber heel plate come with the rise up and screw or just the plate?
Hi Mklee,  Included. If you haven’t received it, we will send it to you as a replacement.
Hi Mklee,    Yes, the carbon fiber heel plate is included, along with all mounting hardware.
